content:
Last week, 211 Ukrainians received loans for the purchase of housing under the Esosel program for a total amount of UAH 345 million, of which 113 were military personnel and security forces.

About thisinformsGovernment portal.

From the beginning of the Eosel Program, 8371 Ukrainian family has already taken loans for housing for UAH 12.8 billion.

Yes, last week under Esosel's program received:

  • 113 servicemen and security officers;
  • 13 teachers;
  • 16 doctors;
  • 4 scientists;
  • 54 families without their own home;
  • 6 VPO;
  • 5 veterans.

Recall that both representatives of individual professions and citizens who do not have housing or want to improve its conditions can use the available lending program.For the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces under contractThe preferential rate is 3% per annum. For other categories -participants of hostilities, veterans, IDPs, other citizens - the mortgage rate is 7%.
title: Eosel: During the week loans under 3% received 113 defenders
description: The government portal informs about it. From the beginning of the Eoseli Program, loans to purchase ...
author: Army Inform
